datasetStructure: One record per finding per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DDSEQ

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in DDTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in DDTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). DDTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: DIAGPRIM, DIAGSEC, DTHWIT
datasetVariables.label: Death Detail Assessment Short Name
datasetVariables.name: DDTESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for DDTESTCD. The value in DDTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: Primary Diagnosis, Secondary Diagnosis, Was Death Witnessed?
datasetVariables.label: Death Detail Assessment Name
datasetVariables.name: DDTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the test defined in DDTEST, as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding as Collected
datasetVariables.name: DDORRES

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result or finding copied or derived from DDORRES in a standard format.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: DDSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDRESCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to categorize the result of a finding. Examples: TREATMENT RELATED, NONTREATMENT RELATED, UNDETERMINED, ACCIDENTAL
datasetVariables.label: Result Category
datasetVariables.name: DDRESCAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78735

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: DDEVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of collection of the diagnosis or other death assessment data in ISO 8601 format. This is not necessarily the date of death.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Collection
datasetVariables.name: DDDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DD.DDDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the collection, in integer days.  The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: DDDY

description: An events domain that contains the diagnosis of the cause of death for a subject. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C95087, 2018-06-29)
label: Death Details
name: DD
